TopicTitle: How do I make Kopernicus planets?

Articles.Content: Hi, I'm an aspiring modder and want to figure out how to make planets with Kopernicus... I have a few ideas and want to put them in motion and I can't seem to find a proper guide to doing it. Thanks!
You should start off by downloading the KopernicusExamples on the Thomas P.'s Kopernicus OP.
I've looked the heck out of OPM lol, I'm looking for the actual coding of it... I'll be sure to check out #Kopernicus. Thanks!
